Articles.Content: Banned for threatening me.
Banned for having an improperly secured terminal.
Banned for reminding me.
Banned for posting after being banned
Banned because Mudkip is eternal.
banned because reading the last sentence in your sig was painful.
Banned because you don't know 1337 5p34k
Banned because the weird avatar(what is it?)
Banned for not reading his username and figuring out the obvious conclusion that it is a vending machine with a Canadian flag plastered on top it.
Banned for wielding a flute. (It's not a sword. It's a flute)
banned "because dangly bit all the things"
Banned because "Okay......"
Banned for not giving a reasonable explanation for the banning of others.(looks in mirror) YOUR BANNED FOR NOT PLAY KSP OR BEING ON THE FORUMS THUS SECOND!! Ooo wait...... Crap.
Banned for too many words in your ban post, and half of them being in all CAPS.
Bannd for not being an employe of aurora-aero-tech
Banned for being an employee of aurora-aero-tech
Banned for banning a person the used THE ROYAL CANTERLOT VOICE...
Banned because I have no clue what you are talking about.
Banned for Telling me to suck a duck and Really Getting banned
Banned because I spent the past week or so brother-proofing my computer to ensure that never happened again. I'm sorry for causing all this trouble.
Banned for the misspelling in your signature.
Banned because i don't get posts for posting here, and i can't give anyone more reputation.
banned for not posting elsewhere more.
Banned because this stupid "ROBOTC New Version Downloader" window won't minimize and is blocking 1/8 of my screen.

banned for not having adequate anti virus.

(royal canterlot voice)
